title: Two Professor Oaks appear simultaneously in Oak's Lab
description: Both OAK1 and OAK2 are loaded and displayed in Oak's Lab at the same time. In data/map_events.ron:3913-3951, both are defined (OAK1 at tx:10,ty:4 and OAK2 at tx:10,ty:20). The original game uses event flags to conditionally show only one Oak based on game progress. Pokerust filters Oak from PalletTown (main.rs:3592-3593) but never filters the duplicate Oak from OaksLab. Need to add event-based filtering similar to how TEXT_PALLETTOWN_OAK is handled.

title: Implement Pokemon evolution system
description: Check for level-based evolution after level-up, show evolution sequence, replace species and update stats. Handle evolution cancellation (B button). Support trade/stone evolutions later.

title: Implement PP (Power Points) system
description: Added PP to MoveData struct and move_pp Vec to BattleMon. PP parsed from pokered moves.asm and stored in moves.ron. Initialized to default 20 PP per move. Infrastructure complete. Full implementation (decrement on use, 0 PP checks, PP restore items) requires battle event refactoring.

title: Start spawn location differs from original Pokemon Red
description: The player starts in PalletTown using find_spawn_position() which spirals from the center looking for any passable tile. In the original Pokemon Red, the player starts in Red's House 2F at position (3, 6), defined in data/maps/special_warps.asm. The spawn logic in src/main.rs:4775 should be updated to match the authentic starting location.

title: Remove leftover unused ASM parsing helpers
description: Identified 19 unused ASM parsing functions via compiler warnings (parse_map_header, parse_warp_events, parse_asm_i32, parse_trainer_parties, etc.). These can be safely deleted as runtime now uses RON data. Removing would reduce ~500+ LOC of dead code. Flagged for cleanup.

title: Persistent move learning on level-up
description: Persist learned moves from battle to party data. Implement move replacement flow (choose which move to forget). Show 'trying to learn [move]' dialog with cancellation option.

title: Add move and item name RON mappings
description: Extend tools/gen_ron_data.py to parse trainer party data from pokered ASM, generate RON files, and load in src/game_data.rs. Replace empty trainer party placeholders with real data.

title: Implement status effects in battles
description: Added StatusCondition enum (None/Paralysis/Poison/Burn/Freeze/Sleep) and status field to BattleMon struct. Infrastructure complete. Full implementation (move effects DB, turn processing, cure items, UI) requires extensive battle system refactoring - deferred to allow progress on remaining tasks.

title: Fix RON parsing for pokemon data
description: Fix invalid RON encodings:  had quoted GrowthRate enum variants;  had bare values for Option fields in evolutions.

title: Expand story events beyond early game
description: Implement SS Anne boarding, gym battles with badge acquisition, HM gates (Cut/Surf requirements), Team Rocket encounters, Elite Four progression. Add map-specific scripting sections.

title: Add item use in overworld menu
description: Hook up item menu 'Use' action. Implement healing items (restore HP outside battle), Key Items (Bicycle, Fishing Rod, etc.). Show 'cannot use here' for battle-only items.

title: Implement TM/HM teaching system
description: Add TM/HM use in menu, check compatibility with Pokemon species, teach move to selected Pokemon. Consume TM (but not HM) on use.

title: Add sound effects
description: Add sound effects for menu cursor, dialog text blip, battle damage, and Pokemon cries to audio system.

title: Cannot talk to healer in Pokecenter
description: Players cannot interact with the nurse in Pokecenters. The coordinates appear correct (nurse at tx:6,ty:2), and the interaction logic at main.rs:7988 correctly checks for SPRITE_NURSE. Potential causes: 1) Player must be at ty=4 facing Up to target ty=2 (dy=-2), but counter may block reaching that position. 2) Passability data in Pokecenter .blk files may prevent reaching the nurse. 3) Unlike the original game, there is no 'talk across counter' logic - the code at main.rs:7926 requires exact tile adjacency. May need to implement counter-crossing interaction or fix map passability.

title: Add stat modifications to battle system
description: Added stat stage fields (attack/defense/speed/special, -6 to +6) to BattleMon struct. Initialized to 0. Infrastructure complete. Full implementation (move effects that modify stats, stage multipliers in damage calc, reset on switch) requires battle system integration.

title: Replace placeholder dialogs with RON text
description: Created common_dialogs.ron infrastructure with essential Pokemon Center, Mart, Battle, and NPC dialogs. Full dialog porting (200+ strings) deferred to allow focus on critical battle system features. Infrastructure is in place for incremental additions.

title: Implement Pokedex menu
description: Add seen/caught tracking to SaveData. Mark seen on battle encounter, caught on capture. Build Pokedex UI with list view (numbers/names) and details (height, weight, description).
